description.value: Steppe centaurs is often a catch-all term for centaurs of the country, but its more accurately a set of centaur with larger, stronger hooves and legs, and a thicker coat that protects them from both the heat and cold. Natural advantages against the realms they live in.

system.classDetails:
Steppe Centaur Traits

  • Compatibility: Bestial (or Hominid with Alternate Compatibility)
  • Attribute Increase: Your Constitution increases by 1.
  • Heavy Hooves: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.93N5CX8O26LQ1WK3]{Heavy Hooves}
  • Stand Your Ground: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.C6IUGKP3IZX9GPYA]{Stand Your Ground}
  • Work Horse: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.Q493IKT61199FS3N]{Work Horse}
  • Weather Resilient: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.1A3BVLJS3HRVOGLV]{Weather Resilient}
  • *Alternate Compatibility: You can choose to instead have the Hominid compatibility for the sake of mix-racing, gaining the following traits.
    • Heavier Hooves: The natural weapon given by the “Heavy Hooves” trait from this branch race deals 1d10 bludgeoning damage instead.
